item.description:
OPEN CIRCLE: Sunday, 1/25/09 - 7PM
Join members and friends of the MoonPool Coven for our Bi-Monthly Celebration and Discussion group. This is a wonderfully enriching, educational and fun circle. Learn about different ways of celebrating the turns of the Wheel of the Year, meet new people and learn to share personal experiences, stories, laughter and joy in the spirit of the seasons!

STUDY GROUP: Sunday, 1/25/09 - 6PM (prior to the Open Circle) – Beginning Ritual
Ever since you blew out your first birthday candle you have been practicing a ritual. This class will introduce you to the basics of ritual construction, when to write your own and when to use others, what should be included and most important what elements are most effective in ritual performance. Even if you have been doing your own spells for years, this class will give a solid foundation on the “how” and “why” of Spellwork and Rituals

Free-will donations and non-perishable food items for the Church are
appreciated as are appropriate snacks to share with the group..
item.name: Class and Open Circle
